channel.title: Matrix 718 Black Screen?
channel.description: Im sorry i know this is really nooby but where do I place the cache for a 718? Also where in the files do I change the cache name? I belive the screen is black because there is no cache so yeah :/. It's the rune-evo release and the client i downloaded from there as well

item.title: Matrix 718 Black Screen?
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Place the cache in the “data” folder.
You get a black screen (when you login) because the cache is still loading.

Read full topic
